name: Vampire Splatter
description:
TriJam#191 - "Isolated" Serious Warning! This is a bloody splatter game where you kill Vampires with the rotor of your helicopter.
Not intended for children of minor age!

This game is kind of a Halloween-Special, but more on the bloody-horror side and not so much on the trick-or-treat side.

Vampires awoke! All of them. At the same time. They have isolated many citizens out on the street to feast upon them! Your goal is, to rescue as many citizens as possible!

If you manage to rescue 100 citizens, you win!
But take care! The more people you have rescued the higher the weight of the helicopter is. It gets more and more difficult to stay in the air and not crash into the ground!

Oh... Take a look at the how-to-play screenshot or open the how-to-play in-game before you start!

We were a team of 3 for this game - one designer, two developers.

Have fun!
Cheers, Gris

PS: All assets that we did not make ourselves are credited in-game!
